metadata.synopsis: The hag has been blocked from conversation and another player has tried to speak to her.

0.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag, GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHuman
0.text: Wait just a moment, sweetie. Auntie is busy.
0.context: NodeContext: Someone has tried to talk to you and you've gently asked them to wait. Cheery and pleasant.
